snippet: Senator Robert Menendez has been helpful to Dr. Salomon E. Melgen, a friend and contributor, in ways that could be lucrative for the doctor, according to records and interviews.
abstract: Records show that New Jersey Democratic Sen Robert Menendez has been helpful to Dr Salomon E Melgen, a friend and major political benefactor, in ways that could be highly lucrative for Melgen; Menendez is defending his relationship with doctor following Federal Bureau of Investigation raid on Melgen's offices in West Palm Beach; scrutiny comes just as Menendez is on verge of reaching most prestigious post of his career, chairmanship of the Senate Foreign Relations Committee.

byline.original: By RAYMOND HERNANDEZ and FRANCES ROBLES
byline.contributor: Kitty Bennett and Derek Willis contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Senator Robert Menendez has been helpful to Dr. Salomon E. Melgen, a friend and contributor, in ways that could be lucrative for the doctor, according to records and interviews.

headline.seo: Senator Menendez’s Ties to Political Donor Are Scrutinized
headline.main: Senator Has Long Ties to Donor Under Scrutiny
headline.print_headline: Senator Has Long Ties to Donor Under Scrutiny
